Title: Aatagara
Writer: K.M. Chaitanya (screenplay), K.M. Chaitanya, Kannan Parameshwaran (screenplay), Kannan Parameshwaran (story), Kannan Parameshwaran
Actors: Anant Nag, Chiranjeevi Sarja, Meghana Raj, Parul Yadav
Plot: 10 strangers set off to a strange land. What happens there changes their lives forever. Aatagara is an edge-of-the-seat multi-starrer that is unique and never seen before in the Indian cinema.
